Hero.greeting: Hi, I'm Anton, a Frontend Developer based in Novosibirsk (Russia)

Intro.title_1: I prioritize client collaboration, fostering open communication

Summary.title: My professional experience
Summary.description_1: Work more than two years in the development of a web-based platform using React, enhancing interactivity.
Summary.description_2: Design and develop mobile app for both iOS & Android platforms using React Native.
Summary.description_3: Developed and maintained online games embedded in social networks (VK, Facebook) using modern web technologies.
Summary.description_4: Have a PhD in Power System Engineering (Automated Power System). I will be glad to begin solving very intricate and complex problems.
